Children and Generative AI

Children are intensive users of digital tools, including artificial intelligence. Generative AI is becoming increasingly sophisticated, making it difficult to distinguish user-generated content from AI-generated content. The need to strengthen generative AI literacy for children, educators, and parents is growing, along with efforts by industry and enhanced implementation of AI legislation.

Key Concepts:

  • Children and generative AI
  • Digital natives and internet use
  • Online environments for children
generative AI digital tools AI literacy children's online safety
